message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this great product for $20,000. I think it would be very valuable to you, and this is a competitive price.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. Could we perhaps meet somewhere in between?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price.  Could you do $17,000?  I'm confident you'll see a great return on this investment.
I appreciate your response, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am unable to go beyond $15,000. Could we possibly meet closer to this amount?
